courses.title: Introduction to Photography
courses.description: Learn the basics of photography, including camera settings, composition, and lighting.

courses.title: Advanced Photography Techniques
courses.description: Explore advanced techniques such as long exposure, night photography, and HDR imaging.

courses.title: Portrait Photography Mastery
courses.description: Master the art of capturing stunning portraits with this comprehensive course.

courses.title: Landscape Photography
courses.description: Discover the techniques to capture breathtaking landscapes.

courses.title: Macro Photography
courses.description: Learn the art of macro photography to capture intricate details.

courses.title: Photo Editing Fundamentals
courses.description: Dive into photo editing with this introductory course on the basics of post-processing.

courses.title: Creative Photography
courses.description: Learn creative techniques to enhance your photography skills.

courses.title: Studio Lighting Techniques
courses.description: Master studio lighting to create professional-quality photos.

courses.title: Street Photography
courses.description: Explore the art of street photography and capture candid moments.

courses.title: Black and White Photography
courses.description: Discover the techniques of black and white photography to add depth and emotion to your images.
